title: Great app
text: I have been using this app for years. You see the total price with no surprises about cost when you get to your hotel. It even lists options the hotels have in LasVegas if you want to pay extra for services so read those carefully BEFORE you book. And remember the hotel almost always puts a extra deposit on your card when you check in so call the hotel and ask if you are on a tight budget. I have traveled from LA to NY using this app and have even checked pricing when sitting in a hotels parking lot so it‚Äôs a great tool when traveling or just looking for a local hotel.

title: Art Ranch Fredericksburg
text: Wonderful get away for Spring Break! Beautiful ranch ‚Ä¶ just what we needed to relax ,rewind and reflect! Shirt drive to Fredericksburg shopping and restaurants. Our girls loved watching out for the deer. Definitely will stay again. The casita accommodated our family of 4. Thank you Amy for being a wonderful host!

title: Excellent Hospitality
text: We were ahead of schedule and were able to check in early with zero hassles.  The manager was a one woman reservation clerk and housekeeper and we appreciated her knowledge of the area and hospitality.  After checking out she allowed us to leave our vehicle parked at the motel while we explored the area and base with our son (a Marine stationed here and the reason for our visit). The rooms were cozy, tidy, and clean with all the amenities we needed for a short visit to the area.  We will stay here again the next time we're in town!

title: Horrible service
text: This app has disappointed me for the last time. Every time we book somewhere and we have problems with the hotel, booking.com has not been helpful at all! I paid 190 dollars for a room where the staff was rude and my daughter was going to have to sleep on the floor and neither the property nor booking.com care enough to apologize or give me a refund. They offered $27 back out of $190, which is absolutely absurd! Then they tell me to look myself for a surrounding hotel to stay, which I already know are all booked up, instead of just giving me a full refund on somewhere I‚Äôm not even going to stay the night at!

title: Vineyard Court designer Suites

title: No customer service at ALL

I was using booking platform for years. Until this happened‚Ä¶
I booked my stay 9 months in advance. When I arrived the owner stated he was booked and I should contact booking.com. Which I did. It took 1 hour to first refund the payment. Then 2 hours on the phone with no help at al from ‚ÄúViP‚Äù customer service. 3 hours later no room no help. They force you to find a new stay yourself.
Worst of all I had to overspend and pay triple of the original hotel price !!! Why you ask booking messed me u and until this day doesn‚Äôt take responsibility for their actions!!! Or lack of action

title: Perfect!
text: Bentley Rise exceeded our expectations for our stay in Lyme Regis. Although we rented a car, the various walks into town each evening were truly a delight as we passed cobbled streets, beautiful gardens, ancient statues and lovely cottages. We had all we needed (and the heated towel racks were an extra delight!) and our hostess Sam checked with us to make certain that nothing was lacking. We looked out onto a beautiful English garden, and unfortunately it was a bit too cool to take advantage of the table and chairs outside just for us--it would have been a perfect breakfast spot! All in all, we couldn't have asked for a better accommodation or hostess--both made this trip a trip of a lifetime. Thank you, Sam!

title: Absolutely Frustrating Customer Service
text:
I‚Äôve used the app for years now without issues but when it comes to the customer service, it is absolutely frustrating and infuriating. 

I had missed my flight due to an American Airlines employee directing me to the wrong terminal and needed a rebooking ASAP. I ended up stuck in JFK New York for 2 days waiting on a response and rebooking. They initially agreed and told me to wait on the confirmation so I waited the first day, calling back multiple times to check. Each time a different operator telling me to wait a few hours, 24 hours and then 24-48 hours. I finally get a call back the next day saying I needed to call the airline to rebook (which I tried but couldn‚Äôt reach them because the line was always busy). 

I call up customer service again asking if they could rebook anything at all and their initial response was to wait another day basically while they figure something out. I had already waited a day and couldn‚Äôt wait another so I ended up having to buy a one way ticket out of New York for the next day. I lost two days waiting on customer service and going through multiple different operators telling me different things. Now I DID buy travel insurance with my ticket and it baffles me that they couldn‚Äôt just rebook the next day flight, because while talking to the customer service operators I found next day flights that were available! 

(Travel insurance is a scam)

title: No protection for customers booking if scammed
text:
The first and only booking I have ever made, turned out to be fraudulent in the photos they posted, and was infested with cockroaches. there was no way for me to report it back to Booking.com for them to investigate or even remove the listing so I will never use this company again because I don‚Äôt trust it. Clearly, anyone can put up any type of rental and they are not vetted for safety or cleanliness. where are you considered booking?

 Make sure you check reviews outside of the Booking.com site because they seem to remove all the negative reviews for any properties so you‚Äôre not getting anything real in those reviews. I saw actual pictures of cockroach infested rooms when I looked on other sites like google maps for the same properties.
